settings.tab_text: Beautiful skin starts from within. For centuries the Bulgarian Rose has been revered for its unrivaled skin benefits. Rose Nectar® is the richest in flavonoids rose product, guarding your skin and body against free radical damage and aging.

Rose essential oil inside Rose Nectar® is known as the highest vibrational frequency substance. It raises your vibrational energy on a cellular level. It calms your mind, uplifts your mood and elevates your state. To health and high vibes!
Rose Nectar® is a nutrient-dense functional food crafted by nature. Loaded with flavonoids, it helps reduce inflammation, prevents oxidative DNA damage, boosts mental and heart health.

settings.product_testimonials_text: I was skeptical and did not expect the nectar to actually "feel good" energetically even though it was claimed to be a "high vibrational" substance. Even for a skeptic, the feeling it sends down my body within seconds of drinking it leaves no doubt. This is the stuff that will heal and help you.

settings.title: Rose Nectar
settings.text: Pure Organic Bulgarian Rose extract. Smell, taste & feel the calming power of the Bulgarian Rose.

Calm is a Superpower - and we exist to make it yours.

In a world that runs on noise, caffeine, and constant stimulation, we create delicious rituals that bring you back to balance - powered by nature’s most calming flower, the Bulgarian Rose.

We grow and harvest our roses in Bulgaria’s Rose Valley - a place untouched by modern rush - and transform them into pure, potent extracts that help you feel calm, clear, and connected.

Every product is crafted with integrity, empathy, and intention. No additives. No shortcuts. Just the full chemistry of the Rose - from field to bottle - to help you rise above stress and make calm your natural state.

Because when you’re calm, you’re not slowing down - you’re fully alive.

And that’s what drives us: passion for our craft, care for people, and a commitment to stay authentic in a world that’s forgotten how.

settings.title: Calmer, Happier
settings.text:
Why treat stress when you can rise above it?

Why chase calm when you can become it?

Why feel good for a moment when you can enjoy lasting bliss?

At Pure Rose, we believe calm is the foundation of everything — health, beauty, focus, and joy. Each of our rituals — from elixirs to mists — is crafted to help you reconnect with your natural rhythm, release stress, and restore inner harmony.

When calm becomes your baseline, life feels lighter, brighter, and more beautiful. Because a calmer you is a clearer, stronger, happier you.

settings.title:
Calm &
Inner Peace are
in our DNA
settings.text:
Calm isn’t just what we create — it’s what we live by. From the way our roses are grown to the way each product is crafted, every step is guided by a deep respect for balance, purity, and presence. We believe calm is not the absence of motion, but the mastery of it — a quiet strength that lets you move through life with grace, focus, and joy.

Pure Rose exists to help you return to that state — where calm is not a goal, but your natural way of being.

Calm isn’t what we make. It’s who we are.

settings.title: Make a Difference
settings.text:
Bulgaria, a country of 7 million people, is the 3rd largest producer of herbs in the world. More than 300,000 Bulgarians depend on herbs for their wellbeing. Bulgaria is the undisputed world leader in growing the precious Rosa Damascena (hence the name Bulgarian Rose). Ask any Bulgarian what the symbol of Bulgaria is, and they will undoubtedly tell you - the Bulgarian Rose.

Buying Pure Rose is more than and investment in your personal health and beauty. You also support an iconic industry for this beautiful little European country called Bulgaria. Our promise is to deliver to you the most pristine products coming straight from the soil of our Bulgarian Rose Valley. Join us in spreading the word and contributing to the prosperity of tens and hundreds of thousands of Bulgarians.

settings.title:
Better for You.
Better for the Planet.
settings.text: The majority of the cheaper rose products (specifically commercial rose water) are delivered to you in plastic bottles, which are not only harmful to your skin, but also polluting our planet. Pure Rose has a different philosophy. Our decisions are driven by what is good for you, and what is good for the environment. That's why we deliver our products to you in amber glass bottles - better for your skin, better for our planet! We are also the first company (and so far the only one) to deliver a refillable rose spray, so we can eliminate packaging waste and minimize transportation cost. Let's save money while saving our Planet.

Roses have been man’s feel-good ally for millennia - symbols of love, beauty, and emotional balance long before science explained why.

But one rose stands above them all - the Bulgarian Rose, known as the Queen of Roses!

Grown in the heart of Bulgaria’s Rose Valley, this rare flower holds more calming terpenes and antioxidant polyphenols than any other plant - a natural harmony that soothes mind, body, and spirit.

Its scent - rich in citronellol, geraniol, and phenylethyl alcohol - gently tells your nervous system to slow down and breathe.

Its polyphenols - quercetin and kaempferol - work within to ease stress, lift mood, and restore balance.

The result is a state of instant and lasting calm - one you can taste, breathe, and live from.

Behind every drop of Rose Nectar lies the chemistry of calm.

The Bulgarian Rose is exceptionally rich in aromatic terpenes and antioxidant polyphenols — compounds scientifically shown to relax the nervous system, reduce oxidative stress, and support emotional balance.

Its aroma — abundant in citronellol, geraniol, nerol, and phenylethyl alcohol — communicates directly with the limbic system, the part of the brain that governs mood and emotion, helping the body enter its natural rest-and-restore state.

Meanwhile, its polyphenols — quercetin, kaempferol, and ellagic acid — work on a deeper level to neutralize free radicals, lower inflammation, and nurture long-term balance and resilience.

Together, they create a synergy that goes beyond aroma or taste — a measurable calm that you can feel, breathe, and live from.

The Neurochemistry of Calm

1. Aromatic terpenes signal the brain directly through the olfactory system.

The key molecules in Bulgarian Rosa Damascena — citronellol, geraniol, and phenylethyl alcohol — are aromatic terpenes that travel through the olfactory pathways to the limbic system, particularly the amygdala and hypothalamus (the brain’s emotional and hormonal control centers).

When inhaled or absorbed through mucous membranes, these molecules trigger a parasympathetic (“rest-and-restore”) response — reducing sympathetic nervous activity and inhibiting excessive release of cortisol from the adrenal glands.

In short:

The aroma of rose communicates calm directly to the brain — before you even think it.

2. Neurochemical modulation of serotonin and GABA.

Studies show that rose essential oil components increase brain levels of serotonin (the “feel-good” neurotransmitter) and enhance GABAergic activity, which calms neuronal firing.

Higher serotonin and GABA both suppress overproduction of corticotropin-releasing hormone (CRH) — the upstream signal that tells your body to make cortisol.

3. Antioxidant polyphenols reduce physiological stress.

Bulgarian rose petals also contain polyphenols like quercetin and kaempferol.

These compounds lower oxidative stress in the hypothalamus and adrenal tissue, stabilizing the body’s stress response and improving cortisol regulation over time.

This is why Rose Nectar produces both instant calm (via terpenes) and lasting balance (via antioxidants).

Long before modern science named its terpenes and polyphenols, the Bulgarian Rose was revered as a plant of the heart — used for centuries in medicine, ritual, and energetic healing.

In ancient Persian, Greek, and Thracian traditions, rose petals and oils were used to cool the body, uplift the spirit, and open the heart. Healers believed the rose carried the highest vibration of all flowers — an energy that dissolves tension and restores harmony between body and soul.

In Ayurvedic and Unani medicine, rose is classified as a natural nervine and heart tonic — calming fiery emotions, relieving anxiety, and soothing digestion, all while awakening inner joy.

In Bulgarian folk medicine, rose elixirs were cherished as remedies for emotional fatigue and energetic imbalance — thought to “bring light to the heart” and clear the pathways of calm. The morning harvest itself was considered sacred: petals gathered at dawn, when the flower’s life force — its prana — was at its peak.

Today, modern research confirms what ancient healers intuited — that the rose’s chemistry and energy work together to restore balance, elevate mood, and raise vibrational harmony.

It’s a bridge between science and spirit, body and energy, calm and vitality — all united in one timeless flower.

settings.title:
How We Make
Rose Nectar
settings.text:
In late spring, during only three weeks per year, we handpick your organic Roses in our Rose farms in the Rose Valley of Bulgaria. We handpick them at dawn, before the sun rises, while the petals have the highest concentration  of essential oils. Through a unique process, we immediately extract the nutrients from the fresh petals to preserve their richness and quality. We transport the Rose extract and the Rose oil via air to our facilities in California, where we handcraft in small batches your Rose Nectar® - a proprietary blend of Bulgarian Rose extract and essential Rose oil. The result is the only ingestible Rose product with the full gamut of the Bulgarian Rose nutrients and a distinguished, pure taste and aroma. We then pour it in amber glass bottles to protect against the effects of light, so you can enjoy the most pristine Rose product in the world. Because of its potent anti-aging properties, we called it Nectar - “the drink of the Gods”. 

Born in Bulgaria. Made with Love in California.

settings.title: Why Bulgaria?
settings.text: We meticulously grow our Organic Roses in our Rose farms tucked in the Rose Valley of Bulgaria - a huge advantage when it comes to the quality and purity of the Roses from which we handcraft our Pure Rose products. While Rosa Damascena grows in a few regions of the world, the Roses grown in Bulgaria have long been recognized as by far the highest quality oil-bearing Roses in the world. The unique climate between two mountain ridges, the rich soil of the Rose Valley and the long-standing traditions of growing these Roses make it the best place on earth for this super herb to flourish. Once mild winters fade, a long and balmy spring brings light rains, high humidity and morning dew — key ingredients to deliver the world’s best Rose. No wonder this super herb is better known as "the Bulgarian Rose".

settings.title: Backed by
settings.text: The Pure Rose team is comprised of world-class scientists, doctors, and holistic practitioners around the globe. Our diverse backgrounds contribute to an objective, unbiased point of view. Our mission is to give you reliable knowledge to make well-informed decisions.

settings.faq-desc:
• Promotes Visibly Younger, Radiant, Glowing Skin
  • Uplifts Your Mood
  • Raises Your Vibration
  • Cleanses Your Body and Promotes Healthy Digestion
  • Boosts Cell Regeneration and Longevity

We recommend at least 2-4 servings daily (1-2 tablespoons)

Rose Nectar is a handcrafted product, made in small batches and comes in limited supply. The only way to guarantee your supply is to join our “Subscribe and Save” Club. We give priority to our Club Members.

Love it, or you get your money back!
Yep! That’s how confident we are that you’ll love our products.
If you are not 100% satisfied, send it back to us within 30 days and you get full refund minus shipping and handling fee.

settings.tab_text: Our customers kept asking for a topical Rose spray. After all, the Bulgarian Rose has been known and used for centuries for its unmatched skin benefits. So we asked ourselves, why does the world need another rose spray?! As we looked around, we realized that there are hundreds of rose water sprays. Most of them diluted, with preservatives, alcohol and long lists of questionable ingredients. ackaged in clear plastic bottles, creating excessive environmental waste. So we decided to do something about it, and we took an unusual approach. We co-created Pure Rose Mist together with our customers! We asked many questions - and you gave us the answers. The result is the highest quality rose product you can find. Two ingredients only, the ones that matter - Pure Rose Nectar and organic rose oil. Amber glass spray bottle protecting against the effects of light. Refillable bottle so we can save you money and offer you more Rose instead of charging for wasteful packaging!

INGREDIENTS

Two ingredients only - Pure Rose Nectar and Organic Bulgarian Rose Oil. No preservatives, additives, alcohol, or fragrance.

DIFFERENCE BETWEEN ROSE NECTAR AND ROSE MIST

Rose Nectar is an ingredient in Pure Rose Mist. It's blended and enriched with organic Rose Oil.

HOW DO I USE IT?

Spray throughout the day to uplift your mood and beautify your skin.

CAN I USE IT FOR HAIR AND BODY?

Yes! You can apply Rose Mist both on hair and body. It is also incredibly helpful for eye inflammation (surfer eye) - you can spray directly for immediate inflammation relief.

CAN I INGEST IT?

Although both ingredients are organic, pure and ingestible, Rose Mist is formulated for topical use. Pure Rose Nectar is our ingestible product.

HOW MUCH IS SHIPPING?

Shipping is calculated at checkout depending on the weight and location

DO YOU OFFER FREE SHIPPING?

Yes. We offer free US shipping on orders over $150+

settings.product_testimonials_text:
I've tried almost every rose spray on the market. Nothing comes even close to Pure Rose Mist! The refill concept is brilliant! I save money, and I feel great for not creating waste.

Thank you for this outstanding product, Pure Rose!

settings.text: The only Rose spray enriched with Rose oil.

The only refillable Rose spray.
Enjoy the highest quality product at an unbeatable price!

settings.tab_text: In the 80s, the leader of then-communist Bulgaria was aware of the health benefits of the Bulgarian Rose. Growing up, he watched his parents take every morning a sugar cube with 2-3 drops of rose oil to boost brain health and prevent mental decline. He tasked top Bulgarian scientists to develop an ingestible rose oil product. Skeptical at first, the scientists soon discovered that the oil delivered on its great promise - it not only stimulated brain health, but also boosted heart cardiovascular health and showed potent anti-aging effects. They called it “the fountain of youth”. Shortly after, Bulgaria launched a patented product with incredible results, and became a major export to wealthier nations. Yet, little did they know about vibrations at the time. That product and the scientific research behind it inspired us to create Rose Yummies. After two years of research and development, we are thrilled to introduce to you the only Rose Gummies in the world! Not just healthier, but also tastier than any gummy out there.

Active Ingredients

  • Organic Rosa Damascena Oil
  • Pure Rose Nectar®
  • Vitamin C

Other Ingredients

    Tapioca Syrup, Cane Sugar, Water, Agar, Locust Bean Gum, Natural Flavor, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Sodium Lactate, Vegetable Juice For Color, Coconut Oil, Carnauba Wax.
Vegan | Organic | Gluten-Free
Gelatin-Free | Non-GMO | < 2g sugar
Vegan | Organic | Gluten-Free | Gelatin-Free | Non-GMO | < 2g sugar
    For best results, take minimum 1-3 yummies per day.

Do the Yummies taste good? No... they taste great! That’s why we called them Yummies. Of course, taste is subjective, yet, two words keep coming back as feedback from our customers - “Irresistible” and “Addictive”. We trust your taste buds will have that same reactions to them!

settings.product_testimonials_text: If you want your children to enjoy the healthiest treat around, look no further! With every bite, you can feel you are doing something great for yourself. What an amazing product for my whole family!

settings.text:
These are delicious! I’m so glad I discovered them. They really do have a calming effect! I have one in the morning and another before bed. It’s hard not to eat half the container in one sitting though.

- Sarah B.

settings.title:
Calm is a Superpower.
Make it Yours!
settings.text:
If you’ve ever pushed yourself to do more, achieve more, be more — you’re not alone.

I lived that way for years — always moving, always striving, never still. I played professional water polo and worked in venture capital and tech — worlds where performance never stops. And no matter how much I achieved, it was never enough.

Then one day, it hit me. No matter how strong or successful you are — if you don’t feel good inside, nothing else truly matters.

That truth took me home — to Bulgaria’s Rose Valley, the most peaceful place I know and home to the Bulgarian Rose, nature’s most calming flower. From it, I created Rose Nectar — a delicious addition to my daily water that became my calm ritual. One sip at a time, I felt the shift — clearer, lighter, more at peace.

Calm wasn’t something I chased — it became my norm. And everything changed.

That’s why I started Pure Rose — to share that power with you. A simple daily ritual to bring you back to harmony and balance — calm, centered, and unshakable.

Calm is a true superpower. Make it yours!

Tor, founder
